explanation: The target function only calls metal_cache_invalidate. To determine whether the target violates the MISRA rule against direct or indirect self-calls you must examine metal_cache_invalidate (its implementation and all functions it calls transitively) to verify there is no path back to metal_generic_dev_dma_unmap. No other symbols from the target function itself are involved in calls (the other parameters are unused), so metal_cache_invalidate and its transitive callees are the only additional symbols required for the recursion check.
